price: ߏ ߢߊ߬ߒߡߊ߭ ߝߘߊߣߍ߲߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߥߛߊ߬ ߘߊ߫ ߟߐ߲ߠߌ߲ߠߊ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
